name: Mage
text: Alas Anakithar! You have returned to us just as fortold by the Old Ones! [space bar = next]

name: Zelurah
text: No. I'm just a traveler passing through, but the path is blocked.

name: Mage
text: Ah. So you have lost your way then, Anakithar?

name: Zelurah
text: I am not lost and stop calling me that! Nevermind, I'll just...

name: Mage
text: Patience, Zelurah! Why don't you use your powers to clear the road?

name: Zelurah
text: Huh? Wait! How do you know my name and what powers?!

name: Mage
text: Oh, how you have forgotten The Way Anakithar! I can teach you a spell to clear blocked roads, but you'll need a wand.

name: Zelurah
text: I don't have a wand. Where am I supposed to find that?

name: Mage
text: By sticks and stones, The Way is shown. Remember the wand and see beyond. By the power of 3 so shall it be!

name: Zelurah
text: What the heck is that supposed to mean?!
